version_description:
Support us with your 5 star review to help keep the updates coming!

NEW IN VERSION 2.6.3:
• Bugfixes

Improve Music Studio by reporting bugs and feature requests to the forum at www.xewton.com, we can't reply if you post them as a review.

version_name: 2.6.5 fixes a bug where the wave editor's ruler was empty.New in version 2.6.4:• Change the wave editor's ruler units to measures (beats) by tapping the LCD• Bug fixes and performance improvementsMusic Studio is now also available on the Android Play Stor

New features in Music Studio 2.7:

Support us with your 5 star review to help keep the updates coming!

New in Version 2.7.1:
• Fixed a bug where the send level controls in the Effects tab did not work
• Improved IAA mixdown

New in Version 2.7:
• iOS 10 compatibility<

Support us with your 5 star review to help keep the updates coming! New in version 2.8:
• Audiobus 3 support featuring MIDI routing and Audio Unit Extensions
• Bug fixes

Improve Music Studio by reporting bugs and feature requests to the forum

• 5 new instruments: MC Drum Kit, Vintage Bass, Dulcimer, Music Box, Orchestra Hit
• Trash folder to prevent accidental deleting or overwriting
• File renaming
• Share option "Open with" changed to "Apps & more"
• Audiobus 3 SDK updated

• iOS 11 Files app support enables you to create and manage custom folders
• Files app (iCloud) import now allows for multiple file selection
• Fixed a bug where touches on the screen edges were ignored
• Bug fixes and stability improvements

• 80s Retro Drum Kit
• 10 additional 80s Retro Kits available as in-app purchase
• Support for all iPhone and iPad screen sizes
• Bug fixes
